CommentBody:
Removed the logs from the DB and now we are waiting for the audit log to run to remove the empty partitions that in the backend are still taking some disk space.
IT will run on July 6th and we will take it from there.

upgraded the server to 5940 using offline patches since they have an offline environment.
all previous optimizations to the logs have improved their experience using the console.
will wait until Friday and see if everything is fine, at which point the ticket can be closed.

What are the latest updates on this issue? Are we waiting for the customer to apply the offline patches or does the SSH issue affect the movement on this issue? Please advise.
Thanks,
Stacy

@Eduard Nut - who owns the next steps here? There has been no update for some time and Netwrix CSM is seeking the status of this issue. Many Thanks, 
Stacy

Stacy, the @ doesn't work on ticket comments. The status here is that the issue seems to be solved but the customer needed some other help and I provided everything needed. now I am waiting for the customer.
I will reach out again
the customer just confirmed ticket closure
